homePage.welcome: Hi, my name is Bobby, by day i’m a Front End Developer at Rosemont Media a Modern Digital Agency in Pacific Beach San Diego. By night, i’m a full time explorer of technology.
homePage.homeAbout:
Engineering Made Simple

It’s only hard if you don’t understand it

My goal is to take complex technologies, concepts, and ideas, break them apart, learn how they work under the hood, have fun and build some cool things along the way.

If you have any questions, ideas, or just want to say hi, don’t hesitate to contact me.
